text: Our country was founded on certain ideals: that we are all equal and should be treated as equals. B While in #Florida legislature I voted for a bill that allowed state to suspend professional licenses of those who defaulted on student loans. I WAS WRONG. Today I filed a bill with @SenWarren to fix this. How can they pay back if they can’t work? #Sayfie https://www.nytimes.com/2018/06/14/business/rubio-warren-student-loans.html?smprod=nytcore-ipad&smid=nytcore-ipad-share

Some state governments are punishing people struggling with student loans by taking away their drivers’ & professional licenses.
